statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{5 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 6 , -10 \, x^{3} + 20 \, x^{2} - 12 \, x + 13 , 5 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x - 5 , 10 \, x^{3} - 20 \, x^{2} + 12 \, x - 13 , -6 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 4\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
